name: La Carretera
overview: Based off the original Spanish language selectable answers text adventure from Raúl Morán, this 2014 version was vastly updated with helpful graphics by Igor Errazkin & Raúl Morán and music by Richard Bayliss and later updates in 2017 added an English translation to share the fun with more folks. The latest version was developed by Rulas International under the Sputnik World label. his is a short, but fun adventure game, where the usual system of typing commands to move and examining rooms has been replaced by simply choosing from a few options given at the end of each section.
